albedo.desc: Evaluates to 1 if skill is currently active
Whether or not Albedo A4 buff is active on the specified character

alhaitham.desc: Current number of Mirrors that Alhaitham has.
Number of C2 stacks that are currently active.

chevreuse.desc: Whether Chevreuse has an Overcharged Ball or not.

faruzan.desc: Current number of Hurricane Arrows that Faruzan can fire off.

fischl.desc: Whether Oz is active or not.
The source frame Oz is spawned on.
Number of frames until Oz disappears if he is active, 0 otherwise.

furina.desc: Whether Furina is in the Ousia Arke.

itto.desc: Returns the current CA Slash. Perform checks on this by using the values under .itto.slash-type.
Returns the next CA Slash that will be performed based on the stack count at the time that this is evaluated. Perform checks on this by using the values under .itto.slash-type.
Returns the number that represents the CA Idle state.
Returns the number that represents the CA Saichimonji Slash state.
Returns the number that represents the CA Left Combo Slash state.
Returns the number that represents the CA Right Combo Slash state.
Returns the number that represents the CA Final Slash state.
Returns whether C6 will proc for the upcoming CA.

kinich.desc: The direction of the Blind Spot relatively to Kinich. -1 - in clock-wise direction; 1 - in counter clock-wise direction; 0 - does not exist at the moment.

neuvillette.desc: Number of Sourcewater droplets in range for Charged Attack Empowerment: Legal Evaluation.
Number of Sourcewater droplets in range for C6.

ningguang.desc: Returns a number representing the previous N1 version. Possible values are: 0 = Left, 1 = Right, 2 = Twirl.

wanderer.desc: Amount of Kuugoryoku Points that Wanderer has. A value greater than 0 indicates that Wanderer is in the Windfavored state.

wriothesley.desc: Whether Wriothesley currently has a Gracious Rebuke or not.

yelan.desc: Whether Yelan is in the Breakthrough state or not.

zhongli.desc: Evaluates to 1 if player is currently shielded
